meanings.definition: A person who creates or initiates something.
meanings.sent1: The originators of the project had innovative ideas.
meanings.sent2: The originators of the company were visionary entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent3: The originators of the plan had a lightbulb moment.
meanings.sent4: The originators of the movement sparked a revolution.
meanings.sent5: The originators of the concept were ahead of their time.

meanings.definition: The source or beginning of something.
meanings.sent1: The originators of the river were small streams.
meanings.sent2: The originators of the tradition date back centuries.
meanings.sent3: The originators of the rumor were mischievous gossips.
meanings.sent4: The originators of the trend set the fashion world abuzz.
meanings.sent5: The originators of the idea planted the seed for future growth.
